description.description: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Starting a new business can be a challenging and complex venture. The demands on your time may be greater than you anticipated, acquiring the proper financing may be more difficult than you expected, and developing a sustainable vision can be more trying than you previously imagined. If you want to survive in an ever-changing economy, it’s necessary to hire cutting edge business start-up consultants to guide you in the right direction.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"At San Diego CPA, we take the mystery out of the start-up process by providing you with expert tools and knowledge to give your business the edge it needs to stand out from the crowd and thrive. Whether your needs include legal guidance, business strategizing, or marketing and advertising solutions, our proficient and professional San Diego business consultants are here to assist you through the entire process of starting a new business and prepare you for future success.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Since no two businesses are alike, we have structured our services to be completely customizable in order to fit your particular business needs. In our initial consultation we will sit down with you to determine the most effective short- and long-term goals for your business, and modify them to suit the specific conditions and circumstances surrounding your business.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Some of our areas of expertise include but are not limited to:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Entity formation assistance (S Corps, LLCs, LLPs, Partnerships, C Corps)","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Quickbooks setup and training","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Federal EIN number registration","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Sales tax registration","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"State unemployment tax registration","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Business plan development","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Job costing analysis","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Acquiring funding/financing","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Accounting and bookkeeping practices","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Strategic marketing and planning","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\nSan Diego CPA will provide you with comprehensive entrepreneurial experience and flexible strategies that address all aspects of your business model. Our ultimate objective with all of our services is to help you achieve real results by focusing on improving your performance, launching successful initiatives, and mitigating your business risk. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Creating a structured and sustainable business plan is the most important step when starting a new business venture. It outlines the route a company intends to take to reach its yearly goals and assists in obtaining funding, supporting growth, and providing a future roadmap to success.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Many first time entrepreneurs cringe at the thought of drafting a business plan. After all, the Small Business Administration estimates that it takes nearly 400 hours for an entrepreneur to create a business plan! Who can afford to exert that much time, energy, and resources when starting a new business?","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"When you need help drafting a concrete business plan with swift and precise accuracy, trust in San Diego CPA to provide you with thorough advice and guidance. Our San Diego professional business plan writing services are guaranteed to prepare you for success. Our firm’s expert writers, researchers, and financial strategists have hands-on experience starting, funding, and growing their own businesses, and take into consideration a wide array of important factors:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Determining the company’s vision and implementing short- and long-term goals.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Understanding the strategic, operational, financial, and capital needs of the business.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Providing a complete understanding of the industry competition through primary and secondary research.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"
Establishing a schedule with milestones, resource allocations, and monitoring.
Defining key marketing and sales strategies and the processes to implement them.
All of our business plan writing and consulting services can be customized to fit your company’s unique needs. We have the skills and expertise to help our clients reach their desired business goals and guarantee that we can provide timely and accurate services at an economical rate.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"After developing your business plan, the next crucial challenge you will face is raising capital. While many entrepreneurs have brilliant ideas and concepts, most of them never scale the venture capital stage because they lack the skill, expertise, and experience needed to acquire proper funding.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"There is much more to raising capital than just simply asking for money. At San Diego CPA, our professional San Diego business consultants can teach you the essential techniques to acquire proper fundraising so your organization will prosper in today’s competitive environment. Our firm has garnered a wealth of expertise in fundraising, and will be there to assist you in packaging your business model into a strategic and professional presentation to our angel investors, business lenders, venture capital, and equity partners.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Whether you’re a small start-up business, a non-profit, or an established company looking to expand, we are dedicated to helping each and every one of our clients secure the necessary collateral so they can focus on marketing their brand and driving their business forward. Our firm’s experienced fundraising and investment experts have hands-on experience growing their own businesses from the ground up, and are well versed in a wide variety of areas including, but not limited to:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The preparation of investor documents","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Private institutional equity placement","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Applications for securities and exchange commission exemptions","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Registering an offering","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Investor outreach and networking","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Developing realistic financial projections","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Defining approaches to protect intellectual property","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Finding the right venture capital for your business is not something that should be left to chance. With San Diego CPA you can rest assured knowing that you will be presented with the highest caliber of opportunities available when seeking investment for your company.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Aside from designing your business plan, one of the most critical factors in Business 101 is financially preparing for the future. Unexpected financial challenges can come in many forms and, if not handled properly, can ruin your plan to build a successful, thriving business.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\nFinancial modeling is a crucial necessity for business owners who want to ensure the sustainability of their company years into the future. At San Diego CPA, our proficient consultants we are dedicated to providing professional support to CEOs, CFOs, and small start-up business seeking expert advice and guidance in financial modeling and analysis.\nThe highly skilled financial modeling specialists at San Diego CPA offer a unique approach to cost assessment, design decisions, and financing strategies. Our in-depth financial planning models make complex problems simple, allowing you to focus on strategic growth plans and exit strategies for your business. In your initial consultation, we will sit down with you to evaluate a wide variety of factors including design effects on first costs, operational budgets, capital expenditure forecasts, risk, productivity, and various other human factors. In doing so, we can implement tailor-made financial forecasts with a level of sophistication that is appropriate for your specific situation.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our detailed financial modeling services include, but are not limited to:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Designing a complete financial model package with major assumptions and values such as customer growth, revenue sources, pricing, costs, payment terms, capital expenditures, and headcount.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Developing a capital formation strategy, evaluating your capital structure, and determining appropriate sources of capital.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Identifying and mitigating potential risks through risk audit and risk models.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Providing a breakdown of all standard financial statements, including the income statement (profit & loss), balance sheet, and statement of cash flow.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Estimating the value of a business for the purposes of an investment, sale, merger, or acquisition.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Whether you need full-service assistance or several select services, all of our financial modeling solutions can be customized to fit your company’s unique needs.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"San Diego CPA is a leading San Diego consulting firm specializing in a full range of management advisory services that help new and evolving businesses take advantage of potential opportunities, solve persistent challenges, and increase profitability.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our mission is to augment the growth and sustainability of your organization through cost-effective expertise and one-on-one support. With comprehensive hands-on experience in management advisory, our seasoned business consultants guide CEOs, CFOs, and small to mid-size businesses in making successful decisions regarding financial management, risk mitigation, operational control, and organizational policies and procedures.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Whether you’re looking for full-service management advisory solutions or you’re seeking advice on a specific matter, all of our services can be completely customized to fit your unique needs. We start by sitting down with each of our clients to evaluate their needs and provide objective feedback on systems or processes that negatively affect profitability. From there, we are able to assist our clients in formulating practical alternative strategies that increase efficiency, productivity, and profitability.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Some of our business management advisory services include, but are not limited to:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Business start-up assistance","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Business plan preparation for new ventures and business expansions","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In-depth financial forecasting for a variety of legal tax issues","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"When you work with San Diego CPA, you can be sure to receive world-class expertise combined with unparalleled professionalism and dedication. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Well-organized financial records ensure that your business operations will run more efficiently on a daily basis, but few business owners have the time or inclination to make sense of complex financial statements. At San Diego CPA, our experienced CPAs and accounting specialists are well versed in preparing financial statements and filings that can assist you in budgeting, forecasting, and taking proactive steps to maximize your profitability.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our financial statement preparation is often performed in conjunction with a financial statement review or compilation. The information we obtain from your accounting journal and general ledger is then used to develop the income statement, statement of retained earnings, balance sheet, and statement of cash flows.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We offer a full range of financial statement services including the preparation of audited, reviewed and compiled financial statements, and currently provide financial statement preparation services, including but not limited to:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"General ledger and financial statement preparation.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Compiled and reviewed financial statement preparation.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Audits – methodical review, verification of information and objective examination.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Consideration of internal controls or specific business processes.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Cash flow projections and budgeting analysis.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Financial forecasts and projections.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Complete tax planning and preparation services.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We keep ourselves current on the ever-changing tax laws and legislations and view our work as an opportunity to meet your business objectives by providing personal and professional services at economical prices. Contact one of our professional San Diego accounting Associates today to book your free initial consultation.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"From scrambling to put together your tax-deductible receipts to tallying up yearly expense reports, getting organized for tax season is the most crucial and stressful time of the year for many business owners. If you want to stress less when tax season comes knocking at your door, San Diego CPA is your one-stop shop for all your business tax needs.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our San Diego CPAs and accountants are experienced in helping businesses of all shapes and sizes with their tax returns and can offer ethical and practical advice on everything from simple to complex tax situations. We provide full-service tax preparation support for businesses including individual, corporate, and partnership returns, and have extensive expertise in providing federal, multi-state, and international tax compliance services to our clients.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Whether you have a small start-up or a well-established company, our certified tax specialists take the time to provide each of our clients with the personal attention and dedication they deserve. Your personal CPA or team of professional tax strategists will sit down with you to gather the information needed to properly prepare your tax returns and find the best possible strategies for reducing your tax liability within the limits of the law. We can also help you design strategies that achieve the most favorable long-term results for your business, such as providing you with a customized tax compliance monitoring system to prevent costly interest and penalty assessments attributed to late filing.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you’re in need of reputable and reliable San Diego business tax return preparation services, we guarantee prompt delivery of completed tax forms, so you don’t have to worry about meeting important tax deadlines. Schedule your free consultation with one of our professional accountants or CPAs today by calling us. You’ll discover why we are the leading business tax preparation and planning provider that San Diego businesses trust and recommend.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Managing your year-end taxes can be exhausting and stressful, especially if you try to take on the chore of it all by yourself. If you want to maximize your deductions, reduce the possibility of an audit, and breathe a little easier when tax season arrives, San Diego CPA can assist you with all your individual tax return preparation needs.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We offer a full range of services to individuals throughout San Diego and the surrounding areas, including the preparation of 1040 income tax returns, employment tax, and sales tax returns, estate tax returns, and trust returns. From independent executives and employed business professionals to entrepreneurs, investors, and professional athletes, our experienced tax strategists are skilled in addressing tax preparation issues for all types of individuals in a prompt, confidential, and organized manner.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our firm proactively monitors federal, state, and local tax law changes to allow our clients to minimize current and future tax liabilities. Whether your situation calls for the simple short form or is much more complex, an experienced CPA will sit down with you to prepare your tax return and pursue every deduction you are entitled to ensure you are paying the lowest tax liability possible. If necessary, we can even implement customized due-date tax compliance monitoring systems to prevent costly interest and penalty assessments attributed to late filing.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"By providing extensive year-round tax planning and preparation services, we can free our clients from the stresses of last minute scrambling and tax dilemmas. If you’re in need of reputable and reliable San Diego tax return preparation services this season, we guarantee prompt delivery of completed tax forms, so you don’t have to stress about meeting important tax deadlines. Schedule your free consultation with one of our tax experts today by calling us and discover why we are the leading tax preparation and planning provider in San Diego.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Welcome to San Diego CPA – ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"your ultimate local resource","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" for ALL business and trust tax help. We provide  excellent Business Tax Preparation, Tax Planning, Tax Consulting and all other ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"/services"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"CPA Services","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" in San Diego and Southern California.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We are experts at Small Business Tax Returns, Business Tax Planning, Corporate Taxation, Trusts, Estate Tax Return Preparation and MUCH more!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"With our innovative Business Advisory and Tax Consulting Services we can help guide you through any stage of business start-up, development, and successful exit. We help you set up accounting systems, budgets, and financial projections to get all your projects funded as well as providing all tax help your business needs. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

answer.answer: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Every client is different. This would depend on the how completed and accurate your financial reports are at the time of turning in your paperwork. Even if you do not have your reports we can help in putting proper accounting books together.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faq.question: How long would it take to get my business tax return completed?

answer.answer: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"At San Diego CPA we pride ourselves in being transparent about fees that we charge. Where every case is different, with our clients we find that on average LLC tax returns preparation fees range around $400-700. Small Corporation tax returns preparation range from $500 – 800.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
